QuestData.Title: Pinchwhistle Gearworks
QuestData.Description: Commander, a goblin courier arrived this morning.$b$bHe mentioned that he is from a settlement to the southeast called the Pinchwhistle Gearworks. They have requested our assistance with some sort of ecological disaster.$b$bIf we can earn their trust it'll be worth the effort. Head down there and see what sort of assistance we can provide.$b$bI've already spoken to the flight master and he's set up a special flight to get you out there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Firn Swiftbreeze to secure a flight to the Pinchwhistle Gearworks.
QuestData.RewardText: Hey, you're from that Alliance base right?$b$bGlad you made the trip because we really could use your help!
